idea: We are Fintech Innovator company that consults and develop product platforms for traditional financial service firms, those that help them be as innovative as the Fintech companies. We serve Banks, Mutual Funds, Stock Brokers, Wealth Management Firms, Insurance Companies and NBFCs to name a few. We focus on the BFSI domain, which provide us deeper knowledge of the business intricacies, operational complexities, consumer challenges and stakeholder interdependencies. This deep knowledge reflects across our products, solutions, and services we provide to our clients. We built digital assets like transaction portals, mobile applications, engagement tools, user experience strategies, to name a few.
name: FINOUX SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
